title: Woman's Ceremonial Skirt
artistDisplayName:
Kuba
Democratic Republic of the Congo
medium: Raffia, plain weave; embroidered with raffia in buttonhole, pearl, and stem stitches, and running stitches cut to form pile; edged with raffia and hemp, plain weave, 2:2 oblique interlacing, and raffia-wrapped-raffia cord
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Gift of Richard Faletti, the Faletti Family Collection
